about_the_game:
A 2.5D top-down, roguelike shooter set in a base that has descended into chaos due to an experiment gone awry.
Fight the robots that have gone haywire and resolve the crisis.

Features

  • Roguelike gameplay, with a different map with each playthrough.
  • Various guns can be picked up in the base. Make use of their features and plan your strategy.
  • There is no reloading or refilling ammunition. Even if you don't have a gun, you can utilize a beam knife for close quarter combat.
  • Unlike twin-stick shooters, your weapon automatically aims at the enemy when within range.
  • You're invincible while dashing. Use this to dodge enemy bullets.
  • Acquire randomly gear from enemies to upgrade the protagonist.
  • Save up money to buy guns and gear at the store.
  • Once you fight a boss, you can unlock a practice mode for them.
  • There are unlockable elements that can be carried over in easy and normal game modes.
  • In hard mode, there are no carry over elements at all. Use only your skills as a player to break your enemies.

This game is recommended to be played with a controller.
